text: 57|21|Ākavē, (maṉitarkaḷē!) Nīṅkaḷ uṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉiṉ maṉṉippai nōkkiyum, corkkattai nōkkiyum muntic celluṅkaḷ. Accorkkattiṉ vicālamō vāṉam, pūmiyiṉ vicālattaippōl irukkiṟatu. Atu allāhvaiyum avaṉuṭaiya tūtaraiyum nampikkai koṇṭavarkaḷukkākavē tayārpaṭuttappaṭṭirukkiṟatu. Itu allāhvuṭaiya aruḷākum. Itai avaṉ virumpiyavarkaḷukkē koṭukkiṟāṉ. Allāh makattāṉa aruḷāḷaṉ
